name: Lab Hunt (demo)
description:
Warning: This game contains flashing lights.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Right-click to use the screen light
  • Left-click to use the camera with flash
  • E to interact
  • Shift to sprint

You must navigate to the end in the dark...

But you are not alone. A creature roams the facility, be careful. Your navigation device can help with getting your bearings and its bright screen may be used to illuminate the area right in front of you. If that isn't enough light, use your instant camera to take a photo with a flash.

This is an unfinished demo of our game.

This game was gonna be something completely different but we didn't have time to finish it so we quickly threw together a different idea instead. Most of our plans and features had to be scrapped but this demo shows some of the things we worked on.

Made by...

  •     mMonolith  -  Audio
  •     Yernemm    -  Programming
  •     YoruVII    -  3D Modelling
